abstract.t: Mobile IP and Network Address Translation (NAT) are incompatible.This draft presents a mechanism of establishing a Mobile IP NATtraversal binding in a backwards compatible manner. The NATtraversal is based on using the Mobile IP Home Agent UDP port forencapsulation of data traffic, thus requiring only a single NATaddress mapping. The presented method optimizes round trips requiredto set up the NAT address mapping, which is a critical measure forhandover performance.
